title: Human Resources Specialist Interview
Interview Descriptions: Quick and easy - very laid back and not stressful.  Interviewers made me feel comfortable.  Asked general and technical questions regarding human resources and my life goals.  Felt as if they genuinely cared about me as a person

title: Direct Support Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at AIM Services (Saratoga Springs, NY) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview focused on the various work experience I had in the field of special education ie my employment with Capital Region BOCES. The interview was also interested in my volunteer work with special needs riders in an equine therapy program.
Interview Questions: My knowledge of the services AIM provides.

title: Chargée De Recrutement IT Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at AIM Services (Les Genevez) in Nov 2018
Interview Descriptions:
Le processus de recrutement consiste de deux phases. Le premier est un entretien téléphonique et un entretien face à face avec deux recruteuse et le directeur.

Pour l’Entretien on doit décrire une journée typique comme recruteur.
Interview Questions: L’impact de l’intelligence artificielle sur le recrutement?

title: Self Direction Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at AIM Services (Wilton, NY) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: My initial interview was brief, over the phone.  They were desperate for staff.  This was as a DSP.   My interview for my current position was thorough and pleasant.
Interview Questions: They asked how I dealt with workplace gossip.
